com.camerontec.catalys.fixtesttool.catalysserver

Interface CatalysServerRunner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalProcessCatalysServerRunner, InProcessCatalysServerRunner

    public interface CatalysServerRunner
    Interface to be implemented by classes capable of running a single Catalys Server instance.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean isServerRunning()
      Return whether the server is currently running
      BooleanFutureWithInfo start()
      Start a Catalys Server instance.
      void stop()
      Stop a Catalys Server instance.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        BooleanFutureWithInfo start()
        Start a Catalys Server instance.
        Returns:
        A future representing the result of the operation being performed (if any).

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stop a Catalys Server instance.

      • isServerRunning

        boolean isServerRunning()
        Return whether the server is currently running
        Returns:
        true if the server is running, false otherwise
